property.value:
function onReceiveNotify(key, value) if (key == "setAllDials") then self:findByName("character.tilt.radial", true).values['x'] = value self:findByName("character.sensitivity.radial", true).values['x'] = value self:findByName("character.amount.radial", true).values['x'] = value self:findByName("character.effectVol.radial", true).values['x'] = value
self:findByName("movement.rate.radial", true).values['x'] = value self:findByName("movement.drift.radial", true).values['x'] = value self:findByName("movement.amount.radial", true).values['x'] = value self:findByName("movement.effectVol.radial", true).values['x'] = value
self:findByName("diffusion.time.radial", true).values['x'] = value self:findByName("diffusion.drift.radial", true).values['x'] = value self:findByName("diffusion.amount.radial", true).values['x'] = value self:findByName("diffusion.effectVol.radial", true).values['x'] = value
self:findByName("texture.amount.radial", true).values['x'] = value self:findByName("texture.effectVol.radial", true).values['x'] = value elseif (key == "randomAllDials") then self:findByName("character.tilt.radial", true).values['x'] = math.random() self:findByName("character.sensitivity.radial", true).values['x'] = math.random() self:findByName("character.amount.radial", true).values['x'] = math.random() self:findByName("character.effectVol.radial", true).values['x'] = math.random()
self:findByName("movement.rate.radial", true).values['x'] = math.random() self:findByName("movement.drift.radial", true).values['x'] = math.random() self:findByName("movement.amount.radial", true).values['x'] = math.random() self:findByName("movement.effectVol.radial", true).values['x'] = math.random()
self:findByName("diffusion.time.radial", true).values['x'] = math.random() self:findByName("diffusion.drift.radial", true).values['x'] = math.random() self:findByName("diffusion.amount.radial", true).values['x'] = math.random() self:findByName("diffusion.effectVol.radial", true).values['x'] = math.random()
self:findByName("texture.amount.radial", true).values['x'] = math.random() self:findByName("texture.effectVol.radial", true).values['x'] = math.random() end end

function onValueChanged(name) if (name == "x") then if (self.values[name] == 1) then print ("turning on") sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE, 91, 127 }) else print ("turning off") sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE, 91, 0 }) end end end

function init() local characterButtons = root.children["characterButtons"] local offButtonGroup = characterButtons.children["characterButton.off"] local offButton = offButtonGroup.children["character.button.off"]
offButton.values['x'] = 1 sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE, 16, 127 }) end
function onValueChanged(val) if (val == "touch") then local characterButtons = root.children["characterButtons"]
local offButtonGroup = characterButtons.children["characterButton.off"] local offButton = offButtonGroup.children["character.button.off"]
local driveButtonGroup = characterButtons.children["characterButton.drive"] local driveButton = driveButtonGroup.children["character.button.drive"]
local sweetenButtonGroup = characterButtons.children["characterButton.sweeten"] local sweetenButton = sweetenButtonGroup.children["character.button.sweeten"]
local fuzzButtonGroup = characterButtons.children["characterButton.fuzz"] local fuzzButton = fuzzButtonGroup.children["character.button.fuzz"]
local howlButtonGroup = characterButtons.children["characterButton.howl"] local howlButton = howlButtonGroup.children["character.button.howl"]
local swellButtonGroup = characterButtons.children["characterButton.swell"] local swellButton = swellButtonGroup.children["character.button.swell"]
sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE, 16, 127 })
offButton.values['x'] = 1 driveButton.values['x'] = 0 sweetenButton.values['x'] = 0 fuzzButton.values['x'] = 0 howlButton.values['x'] = 0 swellButton.values['x'] = 0 end end

offButton.values['x'] = 0 cascadeButton.values['x'] = 0 reelsButton.values['x'] = 0 spaceButton.values['x'] = 0 collageButton.values['x'] = 0 reverseButton.values['x'] = 1 end end

function init() self.values['x'] = 0 end
function onValueChanged(val) if (val == "x" and self.values['x'] == 1) then root:notify("setAllDials", 0) end end

function init() self.values['x'] = 0 end
function onValueChanged(val) if (val == "x" and self.values['x'] == 1) then root:notify("setAllDials", 0.5) end end

function init() self.values['x'] = 0 end
function onValueChanged(val) if (val == "x" and self.values['x'] == 1) then root:notify("setAllDials", 1) end end

function init() self.values['x'] = 0 end
function onValueChanged(val) if (val == "x" and self.values['x'] == 1) then root:notify("randomAllDials")
-- now do the effect selection local characterButtons = root.children["characterButtons"]
local offButtonGroup = characterButtons.children["characterButton.off"] local offButton = offButtonGroup.children["character.button.off"]
local driveButtonGroup = characterButtons.children["characterButton.drive"] local driveButton = driveButtonGroup.children["character.button.drive"]
local sweetenButtonGroup = characterButtons.children["characterButton.sweeten"] local sweetenButton = sweetenButtonGroup.children["character.button.sweeten"]
local fuzzButtonGroup = characterButtons.children["characterButton.fuzz"] local fuzzButton = fuzzButtonGroup.children["character.button.fuzz"]
local howlButtonGroup = characterButtons.children["characterButton.howl"] local howlButton = howlButtonGroup.children["character.button.howl"]
local swellButtonGroup = characterButtons.children["characterButton.swell"] local swellButton = swellButtonGroup.children["character.button.swell"]
local characterRand = math.random(0, 5)
if (characterRand == 0) then offButton.values['x'] = 1 driveButton.values['x'] = 0 sweetenButton.values['x'] = 0 fuzzButton.values['x'] = 0 howlButton.values['x'] = 0 swellButton.values['x'] = 0
sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE, 16, 127 }) elseif (characterRand == 1) then offButton.values['x'] = 0 driveButton.values['x'] = 1 sweetenButton.values['x'] = 0 fuzzButton.values['x'] = 0 howlButton.values['x'] = 0 swellButton.values['x'] = 0
sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE, 16, 0 }) elseif (characterRand == 2) then offButton.values['x'] = 0 driveButton.values['x'] = 0 sweetenButton.values['x'] = 1 fuzzButton.values['x'] = 0 howlButton.values['x'] = 0 swellButton.values['x'] = 0
sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE, 16, 22 }) elseif (characterRand == 3) then offButton.values['x'] = 0 driveButton.values['x'] = 0 sweetenButton.values['x'] = 0 fuzzButton.values['x'] = 1 howlButton.values['x'] = 0 swellButton.values['x'] = 0
sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE, 16, 44 }) elseif (characterRand == 4) then offButton.values['x'] = 0 driveButton.values['x'] = 0 sweetenButton.values['x'] = 0 fuzzButton.values['x'] = 0 howlButton.values['x'] = 1 swellButton.values['x'] = 0
sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE, 16, 66 }) elseif (characterRand == 5) then offButton.values['x'] = 0 driveButton.values['x'] = 0 sweetenButton.values['x'] = 0 fuzzButton.values['x'] = 0 howlButton.values['x'] = 0 swellButton.values['x'] = 1
sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE, 16, 88 }) end
local movementButtons = root.children["movementButtons"]
local offButtonGroup = movementButtons.children["movementButton.off"] local offButton = offButtonGroup.children["movement.button.off"]
local doublerButtonGroup = movementButtons.children["movementButton.doubler"] local doublerButton = doublerButtonGroup.children["movement.button.doubler"]
local vibratoButtonGroup = movementButtons.children["movementButton.vibrato"] local vibratoButton = vibratoButtonGroup.children["movement.button.vibrato"]
local phaserButtonGroup = movementButtons.children["movementButton.phaser"] local phaserButton = phaserButtonGroup.children["movement.button.phaser"]
local tremoloButtonGroup = movementButtons.children["movementButton.tremolo"] local tremoloButton = tremoloButtonGroup.children["movement.button.tremolo"]
local pitchButtonGroup = movementButtons.children["movementButton.pitch"] local pitchButton = pitchButtonGroup.children["movement.button.pitch"]
local movementRand = math.random(0, 5)

sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE, 17, 127 }) elseif (movementRand == 1) then offButton.values['x'] = 0 doublerButton.values['x'] = 1 vibratoButton.values['x'] = 0 phaserButton.values['x'] = 0 tremoloButton.values['x'] = 0 pitchButton.values['x'] = 0
sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE, 17, 0 }) elseif (movementRand == 2) then offButton.values['x'] = 0 doublerButton.values['x'] = 0 vibratoButton.values['x'] = 1 phaserButton.values['x'] = 0 tremoloButton.values['x'] = 0 pitchButton.values['x'] = 0
sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE, 17, 22 }) elseif (movementRand == 3) then offButton.values['x'] = 0 doublerButton.values['x'] = 0 vibratoButton.values['x'] = 0 phaserButton.values['x'] = 1 tremoloButton.values['x'] = 0 pitchButton.values['x'] = 0
sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE, 17, 44 }) elseif (movementRand == 4) then offButton.values['x'] = 0 doublerButton.values['x'] = 0 vibratoButton.values['x'] = 0 phaserButton.values['x'] = 0 tremoloButton.values['x'] = 1 pitchButton.values['x'] = 0
sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE, 17, 66 }) elseif (movementRand == 5) then offButton.values['x'] = 0 doublerButton.values['x'] = 0 vibratoButton.values['x'] = 0 phaserButton.values['x'] = 0 tremoloButton.values['x'] = 0 pitchButton.values['x'] = 1
sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE, 17, 88 }) end

sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE, 18, 22 }) elseif (diffusionRand == 3) then offButton.values['x'] = 0 cascadeButton.values['x'] = 0 reelsButton.values['x'] = 0 spaceButton.values['x'] = 1 collageButton.values['x'] = 0 reverseButton.values['x'] = 0
sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE, 18, 44 }) elseif (diffusionRand == 4) then offButton.values['x'] = 0 cascadeButton.values['x'] = 0 reelsButton.values['x'] = 0 spaceButton.values['x'] = 0 collageButton.values['x'] = 1 reverseButton.values['x'] = 0
